headline: Ejubilation
description: A comparative visual study between a hand-drawn abstract artwork and its AI-generated recreation, exploring questions of authorship, precision, and expressive fidelity.

fieldDefinitions.resonantThread: Testing the boundaries of fidelity between organic creation and synthetic mimicry
fieldDefinitions.whyItMatters: This post contributes to ongoing discourse around authorship, artistic agency, and the role of AI as either replicator, collaborator, or interpreter.

motifMap.meaning: duality of forms and creator/copy dynamic
symbolic marker of finality, rejection, or identity

fieldDefinitions.articleExcerpt: Rendered in pen, marker and ink by myself and re-done by AI. Whose was superior?
sourceFragments: Original drawing completed in personal notebook
AI generation by ChatGPT-4o using uploaded references
Comparison images from Substack post dated July 8, 2025

associatedMedia.description: Side-by-side display of original drawing and AI reconstruction from Substack post 'Ejubilation'
